metadata.title: CVE-2014-3495 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: duplicity 0.6.24 has improper verification of SSL certificates

notes.note: mdeslaur> Amazon certificate is still mismatched as of 2015-07-30 No fix from upstream as of 2015-07-30

criterions.comment: duplicity package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2015-07-30').
